ISSUE.TITLE: 404 page (Twilio Phone Auth Guide)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Bug report <!-- ⚠️ We receive a lot of bug reports which have already been solved or discussed. If you are looking for help, please try these first: - Docs: https://docs.supabase.com - Discussions: https://github.com/supabase/supabase/discussions - Discord: https://discord.supabase.com Before opening a bug report, please verify the following: --> - [x] I confirm this is a bug with Supabase, not with my own application. - [x] I confirm I have searched the [Docs](https://docs.supabase.com), GitHub [Discussions](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/discussions), and [Discord](https://discord.supabase.com). ## Describe the bug The [Twilio Auth Guide page](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth/phone-login/twilio) responds with 404 and it's referenced from pages like https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/auth-signinwithotp ## To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior, please provide code snippets or a repository: 1. Go to https://supabase.com/docs/reference/javascript/auth-signinwithotp 2. Click on "See our [Twilio Phone Auth Guide](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth/phone-login/twilio) for details about configuring WhatsApp sign in." 3. Notice the "404 not found" ## Expected behavior The Twilio Phone Auth Guide link should be of a working page. ## Screenshots ![image](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/35906419/8d4f89dd-cdcf-4845-b1e2-3ee2cd9f6543)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: chore: update cli reference doc (#27163) * chore: update cli reference doc * chore: update cli reference doc

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [Fix #26947] Update Twilio Phone Auth Guide Link (#27178) feat: Update Twilio Phone Auth Guide link for configuring WhatsApp sign in The Twilio Phone Auth Guide link for configuring WhatsApp sign in has been updated in the magic link section of the Supabase JS v2 documentation. The new link points to the correct guide page.
